name: The Last Islands of Man (itch)
description:
The Last Islands of Man is an retro rpg that forces you to manage your time. The waters are rising. Can you save yourself? Can you save your family?

Features:

Story mode (few battles, 1 hr gameplay)

Battle mode (challenging, 6-8 hr gameplay)

Active game time with a Timed challenge

Evolving and expanding maps

10 Classes with reactive team members

4 endings with character variations

500+ lines of dialog

Male/Female Hero choice with 4 skins colors for each.

Custom Soundtrack from Monplaisir and John Bartmann

A game by T.C. Forsdike
